benchmark_details.name: THOS: A Benchmark Dataset for Targeted Hate and Offensive Speech
benchmark_details.overview: THOS is a dataset of 8.3k tweets manually labeled with fine-grained annotations about the target of the message, aimed at improving hate and offensive speech detection.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To support research for creating and evaluating accurate and detailed classifiers of harmful speech on the internet.

data.source: Collected through the Twitter API using keyword search.

methodology.calculation: Metrics were evaluated independently for each TPC and STPC and averaged.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better classification capabilities for hate/offensive speech.
methodology.baseline_results: Preliminary results indicate F1 scores above 0.78.
methodology.validation: The dataset was used to train LLM-based classifiers.
